p:
International Patent Publication
WO 03/066056 A1 reports that antagonism of 5-HT 6 receptor could promote neuronal growth within the central nervous system of a mammal. Another International Patent Publication
WO 03/065046 A2 discloses new variant of human 5-HT 6 receptor, and proposes that human 5-HT 6 receptor is being associated with hematological disorders, pain diseases, respiratory diseases, genito-urological disorders, cardio vascular diseases and cancer.
